dmca.title: Google Asked to Remove Links to Allegedly Infringing and Defamatory Site
dmca.body:
HOODS WOODS Wilderness Video Productions

[private] - Coeur D'Alene, ID - 83814 - (xxx) xxx-xxxx

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043
Counter Notification

June 14, 2004

To whom it may concern:

In a search of my name on Google I am referenced in a link to www.phonyveterans.com.  The material on the site is false and inflammatory and utilizes copyrighted photos taken from a previous version of my website. I am a Vietnam veteran with 16 months of service in Vietnam validated by my DD214. I do not claim to be a Special Forces Veteran; I am an Ex Special Operations Veteran, The United States Army Security Agency.

This site is extortion based and has used Google to advance its goal to destroy my reputation and my business. Even a quick check of their links will show you how false their assertions and how dangerous these people are. I recommend that you remove all references to their site.

The photos on their site in the section related to me are protected photos I own.

Search Query: Ron Hood
Infringing Web Pages: phonyveterans.com/Hood.html

Result:

search term 
[private]
... Dr. [private].... The Phony Special Forces Vietnam Veteran "Dr." [private] using the Phony Special Forces Veteran Shelby L. Stanton for authentication. ... www.phonyveterans.com/Hood.html - 61k - Cached - Similar pages

4. Contact information:

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private]
